steps.description: Go to Plane of Fear and kill the Dread, Fright, and Terror until you loot the Shattered Emerald of Corruption.
Go to Plane of Hate and kill the Maestro of Rancor to loot the Shattered Emerald of Corruption.
Go to City of Mist and kill Black Reaver until you loot the Soul Leech, Dark Sword of Blood.
steps.item_received: Soul Leech, Dark Sword of Blood

steps.description: Go to Kithicor Forest and kill General V`ghera to loot the Decrepit Hide.
Go to East Freeport and find Kazen F`Lakk. Give him Soul Leech, Dark Sword of Blood, Blade of Abrogation, Decrepit Hide, and Shattered Emerald of Corruption to receive The Fiery Avenger.
